location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: 'SKETCH MAP OF CHITRAL AND SURROUNDING COUNTRIES.'

physicalDescription.extent: Materials: Printed in colour on paper.Dimensions: 579 x 824mm, on sheet 685 x 960mm.

mods.abstract: Map showing Chitral state to the north of British India, in modern-day Pakistan. The map indicates hydrology and boundaries, as well as providing some indication of relief. Compiled and reproduced by the Intelligence Branch of the Government of India's Quarter Master General Department.
